title: Anlisim 3 Pairs Unisex Merino Wool Ski Thermal Warm Thick Knee High Long Socks
description: Composition：Anlisim ski socks are made of 70% Merino Wool, 23% Polyester, 5% Spandex , 2% Nylon,which are wearable and comfortable. These athletic cozy ski socks are suitable for all seasons.

Package and Size：This package includes 3 pairs of merino wool ski socks for men and women. There are 2 sizes available: M and L. Size M fits US women's shoe size 5.5-10 / men's shoe size 6-8.5. Size L fits US women's shoe size 10-13 / men's shoe size 8.5-12. The value package comes in fashionable colors, which are favored by both men and women.

Protection for Feet： These wool ski athletic socks for adults feature wide compression zone in cuff and arch support, providing excellent compression support to reduce fatigue, protect the Achilles tendon, improve blood circulation, and ensure a snug fit. Full cushioning absorbs shock, reduces the risk of blistering and keep warm in winter. All of these features provide enhanced protection for your feet.

Moisture Wicking：Designed with ventilation fabric, these wool ski athletic socks are breathable and effectively release heat. They keep your feet dry and help prevent odor. These socks are suitable for skiing, snowboarding , hiking, outdoor walking, trekking, or working in cold weather conditions.

Great Gift：These winter wool ski athletic socks are not only comfortable but also wearable, making them an excellent gift for men and women on occasions such as birthdays, Christmas, Valentine's Day, Father's Day, Mother's Day or other festivals. They are sure to be appreciated by outdoor enthusiasts and skiing enthusiasts alike.
